name: Chase (itch)
description:
Chase - the game where you drive along a road at super fast speeds, avoid random walls and build up your multiplier by collecting little cubes.

  • Very fast, addictive gameplay
  • Nice music (by Bossfight)
  • Pretty colours
  • GameJolt trophies!
  • Online highscores!

This game is free, although any payments are really appreciated!
